statements: UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2019, last_maintenance_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE vehicles SET manufacturer = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry', mileage = 50000 WHERE vehicle_id = '98765432-1234-5678-5678-210987654321'
UPDATE vehicles SET year = 2018, manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = '162738ad-4b0d-4da4-b15e-9b3658e431a9';
UPDATE vehicles SET mileage = 50000, last_maintenance_date = '2020-10-15' WHERE vehicle_id = '8e25b1e1-f3c3-41f2-bc12-5973c652729d';
UPDATE vehicle_data SET vehicle_name='Toyota Camry', fuel_consumption=30 WHERE vehicle_id=12345;
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_date='2022-10-15', maintenance_type='Oil Change' WHERE log_id=9876;
UPDATE vehicle_data SET vehicle_name = 'SUV', fuel_consumption = 25 WHERE vehicle_id = 101
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced brakes and oil change', maintenance_type = 'Routine', maintenance_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE log_id = 201
UPDATE vehicle_tracking SET fuel_level = 50.75, last_maintenance_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE driver_tracking SET total_distance_travelled = 2500, total_hours_driven = 48, last_login = '2023-01-16 08:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 201;
UPDATE vehicle_tracking SET fuel_level = 75.5, last_maintenance_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 101
UPDATE driver_tracking SET last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, total_distance_travelled = total_distance_travelled + 50, total_hours_driven = total_hours_driven + 2 WHERE driver_id = 201
UPDATE vehicles SET brand='Toyota', year=2020 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET fuel_consumption=8.5, tire_pressure=30.5 WHERE vehicle_id=2 AND metric_date='2022-01-15';
UPDATE vehicles SET brand = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance SET cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
UPDATE vehicles SET color = 'Red' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE drivers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE driver_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET color = 'Blue', mileage = mileage + 500 WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET technician = 'John Doe', cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE vehicle_id = 5678 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
